person.persName: Irwin Z. Smith (St. Louis, Missouri, attorney and politician)

body.p: St. Louis, Missouri, attorney and politician. Massachusetts native. Married to Elizabeth Kerr Smith. Married to Isabella Pallen Smith. Moved to St. Louis in 1847. Attorney in St. Louis in 1860. Partner at the law firm of Knox & Smith. Member of the Missouri House of Representatives in 1864.
